Subject: Github Client Problem
Description: We´re experiencing problem configuring Github Client because on commit the remote repositories cannot receive information of packages for a CAP detection (block and report). We want to know if it´s posible to allow only a few domains over github client (allowed on company only).
What_We_Know__c: The customers would like to use DPI allowlists for GIT.
Next_Steps__c: To schedule a remote session in order to update to 5941 and confirm the fix.
